testcase.name: Film Classify System | Add Film | should succeed when film name is valid
Film Classify System | Add Film | should fail when film name contains invalid char (not [a-zA-Z0-9 ])
Film Classify System | Add Film | should fail when film name is empty
Film Classify System | Add Film | should fail when film already existed
Film Classify System | Modify Film Name | should succeed when film name is valid and unique
Film Classify System | Modify Film Name | should fail when film name is valid but existed
Film Classify System | Add Film with Category | should succeed when category is valid
Film Classify System | Add Film with Category | should succeed when category is not given
Film Classify System | Add Film with Category | should fail when category is invalid
Film Classify System | Modify Film Category | should succeed when category is valid
Film Classify System | Modify Film Category | should fail when category is invalid
Film Classify System | List Film By Category | should succeed when category is valid
Film Classify System | List Film By Category | should empty when category is valid and without film
Film Classify System | List Film By Category | should empty when category is invalid
Film Classify System | Film Score | should succeed when score is valid
Film Classify System | Film Score | should succeed when score repeatedly
Film Classify System | Film Score | should no score when not score film
